update(String, String, OtherThing) - Method in interface booking.dao.GenericDAO
 
update(String, String, Thing) - Method in class booking.dao.HotelDAO
Updates a single field, specified by the fieldName parameter, with the fieldValue parameter fieldName (fieldValue type) must be one of the following: (String) name, (String) city, (String) state, (Integer) number_of_rooms, (List) room_references, or (Integer) number_of_available_rooms
update(String, String, Thing) - Method in class booking.dao.ReservationDAO
Updates a single field, specified by the fieldName parameter, with the fieldValue paramter.
update(String, String, Thing) - Method in class booking.dao.RoomDAO
Updates a single field, specified by the fieldName parameter, with the fieldValue parameter fieldName (fieldValue type) must be one of the following:(String) name, (Double) price, (String) description,(int) capacity, or (Boolean) isAvailable
update(String, String, Thing) - Method in class booking.dao.UserDAO
Updates a single field of the document with the matching passed parameter, username.
